nodes.text: DN-314 Tunneler was a mining droid repurposed for defense by the Advozse Hegemony on Hammer Station during the Cold War. The droid used a targeted laser during combat and could also summon demolition drones to aid it. In 3643 BBY, it was destroyed by the strike team sent to secure the station.
The DN-314 Tunneler serves as the first boss of Flashpoint: Hammer Station in Star Wars: The Old Republic.
